title: Robotics Capstone
description: A Python program that commands a bot through a simulated obstacle course. The program takes advantage of localization, path-planning, and path-following algorithms.

title: Audit Error Tracker
description: Capstone project for Noridian Healthcare Solutions. My team developed an application that allows managers to upload files and track errors on audits. Users have a plethora of filtering options to view results.

title: Brick Breaker
description: Remake of the retro arcade game Brick Breaker.

title: ChetBot
description: A Discord chat bot that responds to commands provided in text channels on a server.

title: Sort Visualizer
description: Python program using Matplotlib to visualize common sorting algorithms quantifying the number of operations and runtime.

title: TODO App
description: SPA that allows users to track TODO tasks. Users can organize tasks by priority and progress.
